entry.title: SMCPA01
entry.summary:
Vendor: STARMAXDESIGN
Type:
Price: 0.00

Microcement paint is a decorative paint composed of cement, water-based resins, additives, and mineral pigments that can be applied to a variety of vertical and horizontal surfaces due to its good adhesion. What makes this building material stand out is its ability to be applied directly to existing materials such as ceramic tiles, drywall, floor tiles, marble, terrazzo, or plaster, among others. Microcement paint comes in a variety of colors, which can adapt to the decoration styles of different spaces and give it a unique personality. With almost no pre-work required, microcement paint can quickly transform a space. Microcement paints are therefore increasingly used in the renovation of private residences, commercial premises, and large venues such as sports centers, industrial buildings, hotels, and restaurants.
